content: Here, you can view the detailed storage usage data in this {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a general description of storage usage data in the product. It appears on a page within the Portal Settings categories and is rendered as a text label next to an icon indicating availability. The product name is used for contextualization.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the product name variable {{productName}} seems correct, maintaining readability in the Azerbaijani translation.
The word 'prostoru' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'in this {{productName}}'. It implies a designated area rather than the platform or service itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zde si můžete zobrazit podrobné údaje o využití úložiště v tomto {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'storage' is best translated as 'αποθηκευτικός χώρος' (apothikeftikos choros) instead of just 'αποθ. χώρου'. While 'αποθ. χώρου' is understandable, it's a more abbreviated and less professional phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εδώ, μπορείτε να δείτε τα λεπτομερή δεδομένα χρήσης του αποθηκευτικού χώρου σε αυτό το {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence starts with 'Tässä voit katsella...' which is grammatically correct but stylistically slightly less fluent. A more natural phrasing might be 'Täällä voit tarkastella...' or 'Voit tarkastella...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Voit tarkastella yksityiskohtaisesti tämän {{productName}}-n tallennustilan käyttötietoja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'view the detailed storage usage data' is not perfectly captured by 'consulter l'utilisation de l'espace de stockage'. 'Consulter' implies more of a review or consultation, whereas 'view' implies seeing a detailed presentation. A more accurate translation might include words like 'visualiser' or 'examiner' to convey the 'detailed' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ici, vous pouvez visualiser les données détaillées d'utilisation de l'espace de stockage dans {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after the Armenian sentence is unnecessary and inconsistent with standard English formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon at the end of the sentence: Այստեղ դուք կարող եք դիտել պահեստավորման օգտագործման մանրամասն տվյալները այս {{productName}}-ում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආචයන' (aachayana) is not the correct term for 'storage' in this context. It refers to rites or ceremonies.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙතැන ඔබට මෙම {{productName}} හි ගබඩා භාවිතය සවිස්තරාත්මක දැකීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'ආචයන' is not commonly used. 'ගබඩා' is more natural.

The term 'v tomto priestore' (in this space) doesn't accurately translate 'in this {{productName}}'. '{{productName}}' likely refers to a product name, and the Slovak translation implies a physical space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tu si môžete pozrieť podrobné údaje o využití úložiska v tomto {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "v tem prostoru" (in this space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'in this {{productName}}'. It implies a physical space rather than the product itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tukaj si lahko ogledate podrobne podatke o uporabi prostora za shranjevanje v tem izdelku {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'овом' appears twice, the second one is not needed in this context. It should be 'у овом {{productName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Овде можете видети детаљне податке о коришћењу складишта у {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'productName'-u' should be a space. Serbian typically uses a space before the preposition 'u' when referring to an entity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ovde možete videti detaljne podatke o korišćenju skladišta u ovom {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "просторі" (prostori) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "this {{productName}}". It translates to 'space' or 'area,' which isn't suitable in this context. It needs to be closer to 'in this product/application'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тут ви можете переглянути докладні дані про використання сховища в цьому продукті {{productName}}.
